A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Where do i start....
Ryan Jonhson show some promisse with all the released trailers\, but that trailers hide a very dark secret in this movie...
Some incredible dumb decisions are made by the director that "kill" allmost all the mistery and questions of the previous movie...
Things like\, who is Snoke\, why is there\, what is his story\, his powers\, etc...
Also.. Rey parents and his legacy... this are treated like CRAP and thrown out of the window... 
Then there is the LEIA scence... They should not have "Resurected" it... It was a proper goodbye and ppl whould understand... What they made was just stupid to say the least...

Then we have the Side Quest in the Casino... Very boring and unecessary... DID NOTHING to the story...

Finally Luke... OMG... Ryan portraid Luke like a psycho! A guy that would murder a children and his own blood!! WTF???
Also\, he was portraid like a Pussy and even died like one...

How come that was possible? Luke was one of the stong points of this new trilogy... Snoke the same... And they are discarted like trash... 

It was like\, Ryan see what JJ did on "The force awakens" and just trow everthing away for HIS vision to take place...

I give this score\, just because SFX was great\, cinematografy was awsome and the Space/Force Battles  where very well done...
The story is dull\, boring and right down silly.

For a long time StarWars fan was a very strong blow to the LORE...
Like Ryan didn´t give a shit about the  LORE of the SW universe...

Luke was right... Nothing went the way it should... It went WAY WAY WORSE...
